item.title: DevOps â€“ Automating Kubernetes Deployments
item.description: If you are deploying your own Kubernetes clusters you already know that: Kubernetes is hard But there is hope! There are a few great projects to keep an eye on in this space. I’ve covered some of them in an article you can read on the Lumen. Cheers!

item.title: PowerShell: Office 365 Group Based Licencing Cleanup
item.description: A script to remove directly assigned licenses from user accounts if they overlap with group assigned licenses in Office 365.

item.title: PowerShell: Azure ARM Site Overview
item.description: Visualizing an Azure deployment can be a bit tricky. This short Azure summary script is a good way to start though.
